index.title: Bilbao SKP
index.description: A story about bullying, friendship, bravery, loyalty, courage, personal growth, sacrifice and the importance of acting before it's too late to change fate.

reviews.proflaura: The story shows how bullying affects young people and highlights the importance of empathy. The gameplay allows players to make difficult decisions, reflecting this reality.
reviews.carlosgamer: The story moved me, especially the ending. I wish there was more real support among friends. The gameplay, with decisions that affect the outcome, makes the experience more intense.
reviews.culturajoven: The story moved me, highlighting the importance of paying attention to our children. The gameplay invites reflection on how our decisions affect life.

success.title: Success!
success.text: Your subscription as an Individual user has been successfully completed. You will soon receive a confirmation message via email. Please follow the instructions in that email to complete the process.

error.title: Error
error.text: There was a problem while trying to subscribe your user. Please check the information entered and try again. If the problem persists, contact us for assistance.

synopsis.text: Marcos, a 14-year-old boy, suffers from bullying...

play.terms: By downloading this file, you accept our terms and conditions

steps: Download the compressed Java file (.zip or .rar)
Extract its contents with a program like WinRAR or 7-Zip
Make sure you have Java installed
Double click on the .jar file to start the game

cpu.recommended: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5

gpu.recommended: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 570

metrics.descriptionCorrectAnswers: Points awarded for each puzzle solved correctly.

info.desc1: The ranking shows the classes with the best performance in the educational Escape Room.
info.desc2: Each time a student completes a game, their score is added to their class’s total.
info.desc3: Classes are ranked from highest to lowest total score.

resetInfo.automatic: The ranking is reset at the beginning of each academic year.
